Abdul Quddus Fuseini


Born on 11th May, 2002, Abdul Quddus, popularly known as "Tackle", is a goalkeeper of Islamic Golden Eleven and also a founding member of the group.

Career


He featured in inter-school football competitions for New Atuabo Community Basic School (NATUCOBS) and also Tarkwa Islamic Junior High School.

He furthered his education at Prestea Senior High Technical School (PRESTECH).

He had his Islamic education at Ummul Qura Islamic School before continuing at Islamic Training Centre (ITC).
